item.description:
Hello Everyone - Rescheduled cuz of the weather. Still limited to 12 people. Priority to those who signed up last time. Thanks all...

Kayaking for 3+ hours on the Westport River, Westport MA.
$50. Price includes kayak, safety equipment, instruction and tour down the river.
Please read this entire post – it should answer most of your questions.

We need 7 definites to reserve the trip and it must be paid for by Monday 26 April... sorry for the short notice but hey I just found out I can go. You can use PayPal through MeetUp.

This is an all weather trip… We’ll reschedule for high winds and torrential rain but otherwise we’re goin ! … They do have some all weather gear if you need it.

Recommended attire… not cotton… fleece, nylon etc.. stuff that doesn’t stay wet for long.

This is a Kid Friendly Event - 8 years and older..
They have Tandem Kayaks.... FYI – I’m bringing my daughter who is 10.

Bring picnic lunches and we can have a sit-down after...

Hosted by Osprey Sea Kayak Adventures

If you have any questions you can call them directly – 508-636-0300.

Based in Westport, Massachusetts, they are located at the Head of the East Branch of the Westport River. The Westport River is known for its picturesque rural landscape, easy paddling, and great birding (we have New England's largest concentration of breeding ospreys). They're located within minutes of pristine salt marshes, protected bays and harbors, and the open waters and waves of Buzzards Bay and The Elizabeth Islands.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one in pink tights! It will be a small group - no problem finding us

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Kayaking for 3+ hours on the Westport River
